headline: Simon Property Group Q4 Earnings Call Highlights
summary: Simon Property Group (NYSE:SPG) executives told investors the company delivered “strong financial and operational results” in the fourth quarter, highlighting record real estate funds from operations, steady leasing demand, and a growing redevelopment pipeline heading into 2026. headline: Simon Property (SPG) Reports Q4 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say

headline: Simon Property (SPG) Q4 FFO and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: Simon Property (SPG) delivered FFO and revenue surprises of +0.58% and +10.10%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Simon® Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today reported results for the quarter and twelve months ended December 31, 2025.

raw.headline: Simon® Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results
raw.summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today reported results for the quarter and twelve months ended December 31, 2025.

headline: AI Capex Clouds The Tech Horizon, Even As Meta And Tesla Shine
summary: On Thursday, Nasdaq fell 1.3% as the market digested mixed results from some Mag 7 reports. The primary weight came from Microsoft. AI spending anxiety rippled through the software sector.
